defs: organisation - a) an organising or being organised; b) the manner of being organised; organic structure.
the act, fact or an instance of happening.
something that happens or has happened; an event; an incident.

constitution - a) the system of fundamental laws and principles of a government, state, society, corporation, etc., written or unwritten; b) a document or set of documents in which these laws and principles are written down. as the Constitution of Indian Republic.
(fig.) a serious discussion, displaying a scholarship, but lacking in judgement or sense of proportion; a dull, pedantic discussion.
a kind of paste painted on an earthen pot, while being made, for baking it properly.

(rhet.) an example or simile (for elucidating the fact that the literal sense coexists with the figurative sense in a statement) of a lamp lighted in a dark room, which makes a pot (or any object) seen in its light besides establishing its own presence.
(fig.) a man whose birth zodiac sign is Aquarius.
= ಘಟಸರ್ಪ.
a maxim of the ether being present within a big thing as much as in a small pot.
funeral rites performed by a person for severing off relation with another who is still alive.

a poisonous snake, esp. a cobra, kept in a pot (used for testing the honesty, integrity of a person by making him or her put the hand inside such a pot and it was believed that the serpent would not bite him or her if he or she were honest, etc.).
any large, dreadful, poisonous snake.
a breaking of a pot ritualistically, symbolising severing one's relation with another, as if the later is dead.
(fig.) a permanent, mutual separation of a man and his wife; dissolution of a marriage.
the ninth part of a zodiac.
(phil.) the space within a water pitcher, as a replica of the universal ether, one of the five basic elements which the phenomenal world is made of.
the sacrificial fire
violent disturbance; tumult; uproar.
(fig.) an endeavour for a serious thing.
= ಘಟಾಗ್ನಿ
= ಘಟಾನುಘಟಿ2.
having enough power, skill, etc. to do something.
a very learned, scholarly man.
an exceptionally capable man; a man of dynamism.
= ಘಟಾನುಘಟಿ2.
a small water jar; an earthen pot.
a duration of twenty-four minutes.
a metal plate that resounds when struck, used to give signals or communicate the duration of the time; a gong.
a glass container, holding sand that takes one hour to tickle from upper to lower section through a narrow opening; an hour-glass.
a device used to draw water from a well.
a man appointed for striking a gong once in every twenty-four minutes.
= ಘಟಿಕಾಸ್ಥಾನ.
a mechanical or electronic device used for measuring and indicating time by means of pointers moving over a dial or by displaying the numerical figure that changes every minute or second.
= ಘಟಿಕಾಸ್ಥಾನ.
an educational institution for higher, religious subjects.
any religious centre, most fit place for a person to carryon his or her meditation.
a unit of period having the duration of twenty-four minutes.
a multitude of persons or things gathered together at a place.
a religious institution for higher studies.
an educational institution of advanced learning and research, often embodying colleges and similar institutions.
a earthen container for water; a water-pot.
a programme organised by a university for conferring degrees on successful students.
a place where the chiefs of a village meet for deliberation.
a mechanical device consisting of a pulley and an axle and wheel used for drawing water from a well.
that is joined, connected, united.
that is arranged, endeavoured, attempted, tried.
that has become; occurred; produced; happened.
that which has happened, occurred; an event; an occurrence.
that which has happened; fact.
anything brought about by a cause or agent; result; effect.
the meaning derived or conclusion arrived at (following a deliberation, discussion, etc.).
agreement or matchability of the horoscopes of a man and a woman whopropose to marry each other.

a device used for measuring and indicating time, driven mechanically, electrically or electronically that indicates hours, minutes, etc., by hands on a dial or by displayed figures, either worn or placed on a wall, table, etc.; a clock or watch.
a man appointed for announcing the time.

to take place; to become; to occur; to happen; to befall.
to be got or obtained, procured; to be gained.

to put or bring together; to connect; to join.
a mechanical device for lifting water from a well.
an instrument for measuring time by the trickling of sand, through a small opening from the upper glass bulb to another below it, in a fixed period of time, usu. one hour.
a division of an army, consisting of elephants; a troop of elephants.
an assemblage of large number of animals or things; an assemblage, collection; a multitude.
a number of persons meeting together for deliberation.
effort used to do something; a try, attempt or endeavour.
a cow having milk in its udder.
the act of rubbing by moving one's hand, a cloth etc. over (something) or by moving two things one over the other, with friction repeatedly.

a condition of being pressed, rubbed.
the impact of it.
a flight of steps leading to water (or bed) of a tank, river, etc. (esp. for people to bathe, get water, etc.).
a period, level or degree in a process of development, growth or change; a stage.
a wharf, usu. of concrete or stone, for use in loading and unloading ships; a quay.
a range of mountains; the act of touching, banging on or beating.
a hill or mountain.

ಘಟ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ ತರು ghaṭṭakke taru to bring (something) to a level or degree in a process of development, growth or change; to help cross over a difficult period; ಘಟ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ ಬರು ghaṭṭakke baru = ಘಟ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸೇರು; ಘಟ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸೇರಿಸು ghaṭṭakke sērisu = ಘಟ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ ತರು; ಘಟ್ಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸೇರು ghaṭṭakke sēru to come to or reach a level or degree in a process of development, growth or change; to cross over a difficult period.
